description:
In a world where people are sorted since childhood depending on the results of their exams, only those who excel in education obtain happiness. Learning Types (those who prioritize study) and Cheating Types (those who prefer to climb the educational ladder by cheating) occasionally cooperate with each other, but there exists a great rivalry between them. The story follows C Type student http://anidb.net/ch84608 [Shokatsu Mumei] and L Type student http://anidb.net/ch84609 [Ou Koui] who struggle together to pass tests.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Bullets are fired and the young boy’s body is hit.
How will people change when they lose the thing they should not lose?
Farewell friend...
Here is the first page of the test`s history...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The National Special-Level University Exam of Fate!
Tout se joue à l’examen national de sélection des élites !
Unmei no Kokka Tokkyuu Gakushi Shiken!
運命の国家特級学士試験!

REGULAR.description:
Mumei is confined in a classroom full of traps. 
Trying to escape along with his comrades, they set off the traps and are sent to another world.
A strange old man was waiting there. 
Mumei`s classmates exhaust themselves without skills going up against an enemy that gets stronger the more he drinks.
A sense of foreboding reaches the bewildered Mumei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup bas ! Réussir l’examen préliminaire avec le sourire !
Foul Play! An Old Examiner Grins!
Hiretsu! Rou Shikenkan wa Niyari to Warau!
卑劣! 老試験官はニヤリと笑う!

REGULAR.description:
Snow? In the classroom? Mumei and Koui face a new test and attempt not to freeze to death. A mysterious examiner awakens from his 10,000 year slumber to whip these cheating students into shape. However, things take an unexpected turn when Mumei`s crush, Ryuu Haku, is accused of cheating. Will Mumei be able to clear her name and win her favor?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! Setsugen no Mammoth Shikenkan!
Terreur ! L’examinateur surnommé le mammouth des plaines gelées !
Terror! The Mammoth Examiner of the Snowy Fields!
恐怖! 雪原のマンモス試験官!

REGULAR.description:
The testing continues even at 32,000 feet. Mumei and his classmates are especially challenged when their plane begins to experience mysterious turbulence. Meanwhile, while on an outing with his classmate, Haku, Mumei encounters a new rival. Who is this young man and why does he know so much about pens?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention Please! CA to Sora ni Asobe
Attention Please! Play in the Sky with CA <3
Attention please ! Amusons-nous dans le ciel avec CA !
アテンションプリーズ! CAと空に遊べ♡

REGULAR.description:
Mumei and the others are thrilled with a sudden pool day. However, their joy turns to horror when shadowy figures appear in the water. Sharks with plans of world domination? How can this be? With no possible escape, how will Mumei and the others cheat their way out of this new challenging test?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Earth-Shattering! Shark Strike!
Incroyable ! Le soulèvement des requins !
Kyoutendouchi! Same Strike!
驚天動地! 鮫ストライク!

REGULAR.description:
The tragedy unfolds. A mysterious fate has befallen Mumei and his classmates are the suspects. What has happened to our hero? And what is his connection with the new boy in class: Shuu Rinu. A line has been drawn and the truth about who is truly friend or foe comes to light. The stage is set and the curtain has been raised, it`s time for the show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mumei Shokatsu est mort...
Shokatsu Mumei Is Dead...
Shokatsu Mumei wa Shinda...
諸葛睦明は死んだ...

REGULAR.description:
Another test challenge on an aircraft carrier takes an unexpected turn when Mumei is led to an uninhabited island by a mysterious woman. Forced to face his past Mumei is confronted by the dark and bloodied history of the Shokatsu Technique. What fate will befall our hero and his partner? And what does all this mean for innocently imprisoned father? The trap has been set.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Horrible! The Aircraft Carrier Examiner`s Trap!
Senritsu! Kuubo Shikenkan no Wana!
Tremblez ! Le piège de l’examinateur porte-avions !
戦慄! 空母試験官のワナ!

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious figure continues to taunt Mumei, challenging him to a duel to prove the ultimate power of the Shokatsu Technique. What does this man know about Shokatsu Technique and how might it help Mumei? The lives of Koui and Mumei`s father hangs in the balance as Mumei makes his way to the top of the tower for a showdown with destiny. But why is there a sauna?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goukyuu! Mumei yo, Chichi no Shikabane o Koete Yuke!
Lament, Mumei! Over Your Father`s Dead Body!
Lamentation ! Surmonte la mort de ton père, Mumei !
号泣! 睦明よ, 父の屍を越えてゆけ!

REGULAR.description:
Jun is left aimlessly wandering in the jungle in search of the testing area. Meanwhile, the rest of his classmates are facing a potentially watery end over a spectacular waterfall if they cannot answer the questions correctly in time. Mumei takes this opportunity to have a rematch with Shuu and to show the true might of the Shokatsu Technique!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daibouken! Jun to Mary wa Mitsurin no Oku ni Maboroshi no Kodai Ougon Bunmei o Hakken Shita no ka!?
Grand Adventure! Did Jun and Mary Discover the Legendary Ancient Golden Civilization in the Jungle?!
La grande aventure ! Jun et Marie découvrent au fond de la forêt une ancienne civilisation
大冒険! JUNとメアリーは密林の奥に幻の古代黄金文明を発見したのか!?

REGULAR.description:
A test doesn`t just assess your ability to answer complicated math or science problems, sometimes it`s about how you present yourself. Koui finds out the hard way that not all tests are in the classroom. Her classmate, Anri, decides her friend needs some much needed "girl time" with Miss Ou but will it really be that simple?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiikura.
Chiikura.
Transition !
ちーくら.

REGULAR.description:
At long last, the end of the first semester has come, but that just means an even greater challenge: final exams. Things take a strange turn when it appears there is no examiner. Is this a trick to get the C-type students to let their guard down? But a shadowy figure appears with a familiar voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ga Yondaka Shiranai ga, Daremo ga Minna Shitte Iru. Sono Na wa Kuzuhira!
I Don`t Know Who Called, But Everyone Knows. The Name Is Katsuhira!
Tu ne sais pas qui tu as appelé, mais tout le monde le sait. Son nom est Katsuhira !
誰が呼んだか知らないが, 誰もがみんな知っている. その名は葛平!

REGULAR.description:
It`s too soon to celebrate summer vacation for Mumei and his classmates. Something seems off about Miss Ou. With the moon creeping ever closer, Mumei learns that even his Shokatsu Technique isn`t invincible.  With the Earth and Haku`s life on the line, one final test will put Mumei and the others through the ringer. Is there really anything the Shokatsu Technique can`t solve?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Après la fin, les feux d’artifice...
Matsuri no Ato: Senkou Hanabi
Post-Festival Sparklers
祭りの後 線香HANABI
Opening
Ending
Cheating Craft
CHEATING CRAFT
Cheating Craft
一课一练
One Lesson One Fight
チーティングクラフト
一課一練
